translation.Message_0_Page_0: Alright, <name_char>. We're the last surviving remnants of the <color=green>Irish Defense Forces</color>, the military of this nation. Due to our limited numbers, our efforts are focused on stablizing the nuclear reactor at Moneypoint.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: You may have heard, or even are currently apart of, a pair of <color=red>factions</color> that are currently fighting <color=blue>eachother</color>. In my opinion, as long as you help us clear the reactor you are a proud member of the <color=green>IDF</color>.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Alright, if you wish to join, <color=epic>Major Peter</color> said he needed somebody. He's in the other room fiddling with the computer systems.
